channel.title: Error when I try to run my server
channel.description:
Yeah, I was fiddling around with the stats of some items, compiled, and when I tried to run the server, I got this: [URL=http://img193.imageshack.us/i/erroryhn.jpg/][IMG]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/3505/erroryhn.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
And I have no idea what it means. Yeah, beginner coder here :P.
And, while I'm at it, whenever I log on, it says, "Co-owner Disciple has logged on." when I'm the owner. I've set my player rights to 3. How can I fix this?

item.title: Error when I try to run my server
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

For the error, the AIOOB, Make sure your using TABS instead of spaces in the items.cfg. Also, Make sure that there are 17 params for the line.

Name, Description, 3 Prices, 12 bonuses.

It seems like you either used spaces instead of tabs, or put an extra tab at the end of an item.

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAMEHERE")) yell("The Server Owner NAME Logged In."); }
Except for one thing. that command won’t work. You’ll get either an expected, or ‘class’, ‘enum’ or ‘interface’ expected.

Read full topic
item.source: Error when I try to run my server

item.title: Error when I try to run my server
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“gamerbug, post:8, topic:291584”][quote author=Natey link=topic=385305.msg2891489#msg2891489 date=1248932073]

Yeah, I was fiddling around with the stats of some items, compiled, and when I tried to run the server, I got this:

And I have no idea what it means. Yeah, beginner coder here :P.

And, while I’m at it, whenever I log on, it says, “Co-owner Disciple has logged on.” when I’m the owner. I’ve set my player rights to 3. How can I fix this?
[/quote]Try sending the message as a yell.

if(playerRights == 3){ yell("The OWNER Disciple has logged on!"); }

And in client.java search for “owner” and change that name to yours, btw, what source are you using?

OR you could enter something like

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAMEHERE")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "The Server Owner NAME Logged In."; }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2009, 03:09:15 pm[/size][hr][quote author=Reisyukaku link=topic=385305.msg2890867#msg2890867 date=1248900569]
looks to me like one of the numbers you changed you either made too big, or you weren’t supposed to change. Im a beginner coder myself so i can only do so much.

Protip: if you didnt already know “ItemHandler.java:346” basically means that an error occurred in the file “ItemHandler.java” at line 346.

but finding the line takes a long time, unless you have a true scriptwriter…
[/quote]Wrong format.

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAMEHERE")) yell("The Server Owner NAME Logged In."); }
Don’t try coding unless you know what you are doing!

lol, that is for 317… idk bout what you put…[/quote]Mine is to, mines alot easier to code and understand.

Read full topic
